website_summaries.verdict: Forward, backward, side-to-side - quick footwork in any direction is possible with the grippy outsole of the Asics Upcourt 2. This model is quite flexible because of the low-profile sole unit and the grooves at the bottom. A secure foothold is afforded by the reinforced mesh upper. It is easy to see how this model quickly gained the favor of athletes.
pros: The comfort offered by the Asics Upcourt 2 exceeds the expectations of almost all of the users
Numerous owners describe the fit to be perfect
This pair of volleyball shoes from Asics is considered affordable for its quality build by a good number of shoppers
A lot of athletes like how light this product felt on their feet
Many users feel that this footwear kept their foot stable during landings and take-offs
The flexibility of the product has delighted players as they were able to nimbly move from one position to another
Plenty of people have commented that the style of this merchandise was quite appealing
cons: Several volleyball players claim that this volleyball trainer needed a break-in period to “activate” the stickiness of the rubber outsole and reduce overall stiffness
The durability of the footwear has dissatisfied some testers because the outsole detached, the overlays peeled off, and the mesh ripped after a few months of regular use
The footbed is too flat and offered no arch support, according to a few consumers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, great quality and good delivery
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe, great quality all round, only used them twice but they are far better than what I had before. they really grip the court (playing badminton), they don't mark the court either so they do as advertised there aswell! They where delivered next day to.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: comfortable trainer for walking around the gym - I'm a PT & fitness instructor. Not used for working out as use footwear appropriate/specific to the activity
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, Nice colour.
customer_reviews.text: ASICS court shoe in mid blue for £26 great!!. It's a good all round court shoe, comfortable with the usual asics excellent grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't notice anything bad about the shoe when wearing it which is exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Really lightweight, really helps with being agile on court. I didn't notice anything bad about the shoe when wearing it which is exactly what you want so that you can focus on your game.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Other than the size to big quality of them were fine
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a size 10 whitch I thought was a 44 what I got was a 45 just that little to big for me so I gave them away. Other than the size to big quality of them were fine
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back otherwise a good quality court shoe
customer_reviews.author: barry lathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.  Good look and comfortable to wear as well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Good look and comfortable to wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Qi76

customer_reviews.title: But it is not the best one for table tennis
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are OK. But it is not the best one for table tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable for competitive volleyball player
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very happy with these. He plays 3 or 4 times a week on a concrete court - so wears his volleyball trainers out quite quickly. These were cheaper than his last pair - so less stress if they only last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine 2020

customer_reviews.title: mesh a bit weak so didn't last even complete year.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfy but wish it was more durable. Quite cheap for the squash specific shoes. Will try the new version (Upget 3) now.
customer_reviews.author: Ibad

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Upcourt 2 Multisport Indoor Shoes
product_meta.description: The Asics gel-upcourt for men is an indoor shoe specially designed for the best athletes. Rearfoot gel cushioning system provides enhanced cushioning while the combination of synthetic leather overlays and mesh underlays promote breathability and forefoot comfort. Due to california slip lasting technology, the foot is extra firmly in the shoe and the slippage is prevented. Trusstic system, a plastic element placed under the middle foot that gives extra stability to the foot and also works with weight-saving.
feature_bullets: Trusstic System - Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoes.
California Slip Lasting - For stability and comfort. Upper is stitched around a canvas or EVA board and directly attached to the midsole.
Forefoot Gel Cushioning System - Enhances shock attenuation during propulsion.
Open Mesh Upper - Provides excellent comfort and breathability.
